snippet: Lawyers say former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago has agreed to answer questions under oath about allegations that he was part of a conspiracy to cover up police torture.
abstract: Chicago's former mayor Richard M Daley agrees to answer questions under oath about allegations that he was part of a conspiracy to cover up police torture; Daley is named in civil suit filed by former inmate Michael Tillman, who claims that Chicago police officers used waterboarding techniques to make him confess to crime he did not commit.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers say former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago has agreed to answer questions under oath about allegations that he was part of a conspiracy to cover up police torture.

headline.seo: Chicago: Former Mayor Will Testify on Accusations of Police Torture
headline.main: Chicago: Former Mayor Will Testify on Accusations of Police Torture
headline.print_headline: Chicago: Former Mayor Will Testify On Accusations of Police Torture
